= Introduction =

{{{
apt-get install cmake
apt-get install g++
apt-get install make
apt-get install libwxbase2.8-dev
apt-get install libjpeg62-dev
apt-get install libpng12-dev
apt-get install libglew1.5-dev
apt-get install libbz2-dev

svn checkout http://wowmodelviewer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ wowmodelviewer-read-only
cd wowmodelviewer-read-only
cmake .
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/xp/wmv/src

}}}
